check_generation()¶

Check the cost of each individual of the generation in the cost function. :return:

Selection of the best individuals to mutate the next generation :return:

new_generation()¶

Creates a new generation of individuals. :return: updates the generation DataFrame

run(output=True)¶

Algorithm run execution. :param output: Boolean. If True then an output is printed in each iteration. Otherwise, not. :return: best_individual array, best MAE found double

update_vector_probabilities()¶

Re-build the vector of statistics based on the selection of the best individuals of the generation :return: update the vector of statistics
